attributes.title: So awful!
attributes.review: It kept crashing. I tried and tried to get it to work, I tried it so many times, I did, so many. I’m the best at trying to figure out apps but the app has to be broken

attributes.title: Awful app
attributes.review: This app was just terrible. I was insulted that I couldn’t use it at the highest level. This app should be immediately taken down for it poor performance and quality.

attributes.title: very sad
attributes.review: When i downloaded this app i was super excited about learning techniques for pouring concrete but it’s been two week with me trying to use the app and all i can find i weird political stuff.

attributes.title: Just don’t get it...
attributes.review: The app made my phone crash. Literally. Ironic, isn’t it? VOTE BIDEN 2020. For our climate, for women’s rights, to finally get out of this pandemic, for trans people, for a better future for our children. It is our only option.

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: We are gen z and we are not putting up with TikTok getting canceled. The app has many bugs and just doesn’t work correctly I have a big orange dot in the middle that won’t go away

attributes.title: Trash
attributes.review: This app has no made my phone crash I think the whole thing in regards to it is horrible the app itself is not allowing my phone to open it without glitching!!

attributes.title: gross
attributes.review: absolutely mortifying. i open up the app and the FIRST thing i see... an orange thing🤢i was disgusted to my core. i can’t believe they would put HIM as the first photo. whoever designed this app needs serious physco logical help. all i have to say is ....... no❤️

attributes.title: terrible 👎🏽
attributes.review: App crashes constantly and took more than an hour to download would not recommend getting this app wouldn’t be worth your time at all.

attributes.title: Aw darn!
attributes.review: I was so excited to download this app and get my daily affirmation of white supremacy, then I took a long hard look in the mirror and realized by supporting trump i am also supporting homophobia, xenophobia and racism. I will now be taking time out of my day to rethink my morals. :(

attributes.title: 👁👄👁 Que
attributes.review:
Dear Dad.

This app is very bad, I tried to give it five stars but I had to compliment the ocean or else it gets sad. Sorry but this app is done VERY poorly. I’m sorry Mr. Cheeto Man this was a TERRIBLE experience. Gen Z hurt your feelings again didn’t they sorry I will tell those meany poo-poo buttheats to stop

- Barron Trump
